ApnaGhar: Orphanage Donation System

Our mission is to help you make a positive impact on the world by enabling you to easily donate to causes you care about.

Contact Us

In India, we often see orphanage and donors working in silos lacking a common standardized platform to handle end-to-end donation processes. ApnaGhar aims to address this critical issue by bridging this gap between donors and recipients. In this system, donors will be assisted throughout the donation decision-making process. Verified recipientsâ€™ demands will be fulfilled swiftly through volunteers. This platform promises to bring credibility and efficiency in the existing system.

If you have any questions, feedback, or want to get involved with ApanaGhar, please don't hesitate to reach out to us.

Contact Information:

Address: XYZ street, ABC city, India

Email: info@ApanaGhar.com

Phone: +91-1234567890

For inquiries or partnership opportunities, please contact us:
Email:{" "} info@ApanaGhar.com
